attributes.action: Knight The Late Brian Clough, OBE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Brian Clough (1935 - 2004) deserves to be knigted for his services to football.

His numerous achievements, particularly as a Manager included 2 consecutive European Cups with Nottingham Forest. He will probably be best remembered for his achievements as a manager with Forest and Derby County. Very few managers will ever enjoy such succeses.

It's about time Cloughie's achievements were properly recognised and I see no reason why he shouldn't be awarded a Knighthood.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
